committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for further diversification of the Federal Reserve boards of directors, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Reserve Board of Directors Act

summary.text: Federal Reserve Board of Directors Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to increase the size of the boards of directors of Federal Reserve banks from 9 to 12 members. Increases the term of office for such directors from three to four years. Directs that the initial appointees to the positions created by this Act serve until December 31, 1981.

titles.title: Federal Reserve Board of Directors Act
A bill to provide for further diversification of the Federal Reserve boards of directors, and for other purposes.
